name: Webinaria Recording Cut
summary: Learn about .RCUT files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: When you save and create an RCUT file, an .AVI file is saved in the same location as the RCUT file and stores the video of the recording. You can export an RCUT project to Flash video .FLV files. You can also publish your project to the Webinaria website.

description: Recording project created and used by Webinaria, an application used to record software tutorials and demonstrations; contains edits, such as added intervals for text and sound, that have been made to a screen recording; does not contain actual video.
